meanings.definition: A person who is able to perform multiple tasks simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: Multitaskers can juggle many tasks at once.
meanings.sent2: I admire how multitaskers can handle various tasks at the same time.
meanings.sent3: The multitaskers at the office make it look easy to do many things together.
meanings.sent4: She is like a multitasker, effortlessly managing different tasks like a skilled juggler.
meanings.sent5: The multitaskers in the kitchen cooked, cleaned, and chatted all at once.

meanings.definition: The act of performing multiple tasks at the same time.
meanings.sent1: Multitaskers require focus to accomplish many tasks simultaneously.
meanings.sent2: Efficient work often involves multitaskers handling various tasks concurrently.
meanings.sent3: The art of multitaskers is like a dance of completing tasks in harmony.
meanings.sent4: In a busy office, multitaskers are like conductors orchestrating a symphony of tasks.
meanings.sent5: The multitaskers in the room typed, answered calls, and organized files all at once.
